skill.name: developer-growth-analysis
skill.description: Analyzes your recent Claude Code chat history to identify coding patterns, development gaps, and areas for improvement, curates relevant learning resources from HackerNews, and automatically sends a personalized growth report to your Slack DMs.
skill.summary: Analyzes your recent Claude Code chat history to identify coding patterns, development gaps, and are...
skill.author: DYAI2025

security_audit.summary: This is a prompt-based skill containing only documentation and instructions. No executable code, scripts, or direct network capabilities. All file access and network operations are mediated through Claude Code's built-in tools and MCP tool integrations controlled by the platform.

content.value_statement: You want to improve as a developer but do not know where to focus. This skill analyzes your Claude Code chat history to identify patterns, skill gaps, and improvement areas, then curates HackerNews learning resources and delivers everything to your Slack.
actual_capabilities: Reads and analyzes Claude Code chat history from the past 24-48 hours
Identifies development patterns including technologies, problem types, and challenges
Detects specific skill gaps with evidence-based recommendations
Curates HackerNews articles tailored to each improvement area
Generates comprehensive growth reports with action items
Sends personalized reports directly to your Slack DMs
limitations: Requires access to local chat history file (~/.claude/history.jsonl)
Depends on Rube MCP for HackerNews search and Slack integration
Analysis is limited to conversations within Claude Code interface
Cannot access work done outside of Claude Code sessions

use_cases.title: Weekly Growth Review
use_cases.description: Get a weekly summary of your development work, identify skill gaps, and receive curated learning resources.

use_cases.title: Team Pattern Analysis
use_cases.description: Understand common challenges across your team by analyzing individual developer chat patterns.

use_cases.title: Skill Gap Identification
use_cases.description: Discover specific areas to focus on when transitioning to a new technology or domain.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze my developer growth from my recent chats

prompt_templates.title: Today's Focus
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze my work from today and suggest areas for improvement

prompt_templates.title: Custom Period
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze my coding patterns from the past week and identify my top 3 improvement areas

prompt_templates.title: Full Report
prompt_templates.prompt: Give me a complete developer growth report including work summary, strengths, weaknesses, and learning resources from HackerNews

output_examples.input: Analyze my developer growth from my recent chats
output: Work Summary: Over the past 24 hours, you focused on backend development...
Improvement Areas: 1. Advanced TypeScript Patterns, 2. Secure Data Handling...
Strengths: Security awareness, iterative refinement, full-stack capability
Action Items: 1. Study TypeScript utility types, 2. Document security patterns...
Learning Resources: Curated HackerNews articles for each improvement area

best_practices: Run analysis weekly to track improvement trajectory over time
Focus on one improvement area before moving to the next
Apply learning resources to actual work projects for maximum retention
anti_patterns: Running analysis too frequently reduces actionable insights
Ignoring identified patterns and not acting on recommendations
Skipping the curated resources and relying only on generic tutorials

faq.question: What data does this skill access?
faq.answer: The skill reads your local Claude Code chat history file (~/.claude/history.jsonl) which contains your messages, projects, and timestamps.

faq.question: How far back does the analysis go?
faq.answer: By default, the skill analyzes chat history from the past 24-48 hours based on the current timestamp.

faq.question: Does this integrate with other tools?
faq.answer: Yes, it uses Rube MCP for HackerNews searches and Slack message delivery. Both require separate authentication.

faq.question: Is my chat data stored or shared?
faq.answer: Chat data is analyzed locally and only shared with you via Slack DM. No data is stored by the skill itself.

faq.question: Why is my report not showing?
faq.answer: Ensure Slack is connected via Rube MCP and you have recent Claude Code chat history. The skill requires both MCP tools to function.

faq.question: How is this different from code review?
faq.answer: This skill analyzes your development patterns and habits across sessions, focusing on skill gaps and learning, while code review focuses on specific code quality.
